formatDescription: The Interoperable Master Format (IMF) is a file-based media format, and an IMF Package (IMP) is a collection of media files with accompanying XML data describing the IMF Package structure. The Asset Map is an XML file that provides a mapping between the UUIDs and filenames used within an IMP. An Asset Map file should be found alongside the other IMP component files described within the file.

internalSignatures.name: IMF Package Asset Map
internalSignatures.note: XML declaration, followed by <AssetMap opening tag, shortly followed by a reference to http://www.smpte-ra.org, included here to avoid any incidental clashes with non-IMF formats using similar tags. Note that this signature doesn’t currently utilize any specific XML Namespace element for the Asset Map, although this could be included if there is a requirement to distinguish between different schema compliance.

supportedBy.supportedBy: SMPTE / Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers

developedBy.developedBy: SMPTE / Society of Motion Picture and Television Engineers
